original_title: DIY Cleats Give You Traction In Ice And Snow
original_content:
Its getting into the cold and snowy season for much of the world, and that means it can be slippy when you go walking outside. If you need more traction, but your shoes dont have spikes, fear not. You can build yourself a set of these nifty strap-on cleats designed by [Zero To Infinity].
The cleats are a 3D printed design, which [Zero To Infinity] modeled in Fusion 360 to match their own shoes. Obviously, everybodys shoes differ, so theyve provided simple instructions on how to design your own similar cleats to suit your personal footwear. Theyre then printed in a stiff TPU to give them the right amount of flex for bending to conform to the shoe. The cleats themselves are simply M4 bolts, nuts, and washers screwed through the cleats, pointy-side down. They can then be strapped to a shoe, and youre done!
Wed love to see a set of snow shoes that are fully printed and ready to accept cleats. Indeed, weve seen some neat printed sneaker designs before. They havent really caught on yet, but theres nothing to stop you printing the hottest kicks of 2024 right in your own home. When you do, dont hesitate to hit up the tipsline!
title: 自分の靴に装着できる3Dプリント製のスパイクを作ろう！
body: 雪や氷がある季節になると、歩くのが滑りやすくなります。スパイクのついていない靴でも、この便利な装着式クリートを作ることができます。ハードウェアを3Dプリントし、自分専用の靴に合わせてデザインすることができます。ボルトとナットで靴に固定すれば完成です。
titles: 自分の靴に装着できる3Dプリント製のスパイクを作ろう！

寒い季節にも安心！自作ストラップ付きスパイクで滑りにくい靴にしよう
靴に簡単に取り付けられるスパイクの作り方を紹介
2024年の最新キックスを自宅でプリントしよう！応用編：スパイク付きスノーシューズ
